main.name: Aleck Kitenge
main.description: I'm an Aspiring Full Stack Web Developer, and I design and develop experiences that make life simpler. Pour yourself some coffee, sit back and have a look around; I'm sure you'll find it worth your while...
main.bio: I was Born in Bordeaux, Cultured by Congo, Nurtured by Nairobi, Galvanised by Gaborone,  Woken by Windhoek and sent off to face the world as a young adult by South Africa. As you've probably already guessed, that's a bunch of air miles. But if there's anything I've garnered from all of that travel, it is a profound appreciation of the power that simple communication between people can play in solving even the seemingly hardest problems in the world. And I look to do my part. One MERN stack line of code at a time.
main.contactmessage: Kindly drop me an email and let's see about bringing life to your ideas.

resume.skillmessage: A snapshot of various skills I've amassed and continue to improve upon on my journey to becoming a Full Stack Web Developer

testimonials.text: I know Aleck very well on both a personal and professional level. He is a very friendly, honest and humorous gentleman that everyone wants to be around. He is professional, hardworking and often consulted at work where high-level decisions are being made. Aleck works absolutely well both with individuals and within a team structure
testimonials.user: Florence Onyango - Late Former Managing Director of Probe Market Intelligence

testimonials.text: Aleck's contributions as Strategist were impressive and valuable. He demonstrated enthusiasm and creativity towards all the projects undertaken under his responsibility
testimonials.user: Vic Hanna - Former Group Chairman, Medcom Group of Companies
